Evaluate this sentence: Company A pays Company B $10 million for a revolutionary AI software within 12 months . If Company B fails to deliver a fully functional product by the deadline , they must refund 50 % of the payment and provide an additional 3 months of development free . However , if the delay is due to circumstances beyond Company B ’ s reasonable control , these penalties shall not apply . This agreement is governed by California law and any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration .

This sentence describes a contractual agreement between Company A and Company B for the purchase of a revolutionary AI software. The purchase price is $10 million, and Company B is expected to deliver a fully functional product to Company A within 12 months.

If Company B fails to meet the deadline, they will be subject to penalties. Specifically, they must refund 50% of the payment to Company A and provide an additional three months of development free of charge. However, if the delay is caused by circumstances beyond Company B's reasonable control, such as natural disasters or government actions, these penalties will not apply.
